docker.name: EXPORT
docker.args: GNUPGHOME=/jetty-keys ; 	mkdir -p "$GNUPGHOME" ;         for key in $JETTY_GPG_KEYS; do                 for server in                         ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net                         p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80                         ipv4.pool.sks-keyservers.net                         pgp.mit.edu ;                 do                         if gpg --batch --keyserver "$server" --recv-keys "$key"; then                                 break;                         fi;                 done;         done ; 	#
docker.raw: export GNUPGHOME=/jetty-keys ; 	mkdir -p "$GNUPGHOME" ;         for key in $JETTY_GPG_KEYS; do                 for server in                         ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net                         p80.pool.sks-keyservers.net:80                         ipv4.pool.sks-keyservers.net                         pgp.mit.edu ;                 do                         if gpg --batch --keyserver "$server" --recv-keys "$key"; then                                 break;                         fi;                 done;         done ; 	#

docker.name: MKDIR
docker.raw: mkdir -p "$JETTY_HOME" ; 	cd $JETTY_HOME ; 	curl -SL "$JETTY_TGZ_URL" -o jetty.tar.gz ; 	curl -SL "$JETTY_TGZ_URL.asc" -o jetty.tar.gz.asc ; 	#

docker.name: MKDIR
docker.args: -p "$JETTY_BASE" ; 	cd $JETTY_BASE ; 	java -jar "$JETTY_HOME/start.jar" --create-startd 		--add-to-start="server,http,deploy,jsp,jstl,ext,resources,websocket" ; 	mkdir -p "$TMPDIR" ; 	groupadd -r jetty && useradd -r -g jetty jetty ; 	chown -R jetty:jetty "$JETTY_HOME" "$JETTY_BASE" "$TMPDIR" ; 	#
docker.raw: mkdir -p "$JETTY_BASE" ; 	cd $JETTY_BASE ; 	java -jar "$JETTY_HOME/start.jar" --create-startd 		--add-to-start="server,http,deploy,jsp,jstl,ext,resources,websocket" ; 	mkdir -p "$TMPDIR" ; 	groupadd -r jetty && useradd -r -g jetty jetty ; 	chown -R jetty:jetty "$JETTY_HOME" "$JETTY_BASE" "$TMPDIR" ; 	#
